info.title: Sec-Gemini
info.description: P9 the most capable cybersecurity AI

post.description: Delete a file from the session
Upload a file to cloud bucket and attach it to the session

schema.title: Response List V1 Session List Get
Response Get V1 Session Get Get

get.description: Provide an overview of sec-gemini agent current configuration
Returns the diagnostics information for the application.
Performs health checks and returns the status of the application and its dependencies.

session_id.title: Session ID
session_id.description: The session ID this file should be attached to.

mime_type.title: Mime Type
mime_type.description: The mime type of the file.

content.title: File Content
content.description: The content of the file as string. Always base64 encoded.

Attachment.title: Attachment
Attachment.description: Represents a file upload to the session.

session_id.title: Session ID
session_id.description: The session ID this feedback should be attached to.

group_id.title: Group ID
group_id.description: The message group ID this feedback should be attached to.

Feedback.title: Feedback
Feedback.description: Represents a feedback to the session.

FeedbackType.title: FeedbackType
FeedbackType.description: Type of feedback that can be sent to the system.

id.title: Message ID
id.description: A unique identifier for the message - uuid4 int.

parent_id.title: Parent Message ID
parent_id.description: The ID of the parent message.

turn.title: Conversation Turn
turn.description: The turn identifier is used to group/message are part of the same conversation turn.

group.title: Message Group
group.description: The Group ID (UUID4) identify messages part of the same generation or action.

actor.title: Actor
actor.description: The actor of the message - user or agent.

role.description: The role of the messages author.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) of when the message was created.

message_type.title: Message Type
message_type.description: The type of message - Generation, Tool Call, or Info.

message_sub_type.title: Message Sub Type
message_sub_type.description: The sub type of the message - e.g. function name.

state.description: The state the message belongs to.

content.title: Message Content
content.description: The content of the message encoded as utf-8 bytes.

mime_type.title: Content Type
mime_type.description: The content type of the content field.

status_code.title: Status Code
status_code.description: The status code of the message. 2xx is Okay, 4xx is a client error, 5xx is a server error.

usage.title: Model Usage Statistics
usage.description: Token counts when message was generated by model.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents the content of the session both in request and response.

model_string.title: Model String
model_string.description: The string used to identify the model.

is_experimental.title: Is Experimental
is_experimental.description: Whether the model is experimental or not.

subagents.title: Subagents
subagents.description: The list of subagents that make up the model.

description.title: Component Description
description.description: A brief description of the component.

is_enabled.title: Is Enabled
is_enabled.description: Whether the component is enabled or not.

is_optional.title: Is Optional
is_optional.description: Whether the component is optional or not.

is_experimental.title: Is Experimental
is_experimental.description: Whether the component is experimental or not.

ModelSubAgentInfo.title: ModelSubAgentInfo
ModelSubAgentInfo.description: Describes the components of a Sec-Gemini model.

ok.title: Operation Result
ok.description: True if the operation was successful.

mime_type.title: Data Type
mime_type.description: The type of data in the data field.

latency.title: Latency
latency.description: The time taken to complete the request in seconds.

user_id.title: User ID
user_id.description: The user ID this session belongs to.

org_id.title: Organization ID
org_id.description: The organization ID this session belongs to.

model.title: Model
model.description: Model configuration used in the session.

ttl.title: Time to Live
ttl.description: The time to live of the session in seconds.

language.title: Language
language.description: The iso-code of the session language.

turns.title: Number of Turns
turns.description: The number of turns in the session.

description.title: Session Description
description.description: A brief description to help users remember what the session is about.

create_time.title: Create Time
create_time.description: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) of when the session was created.

update_time.title: Update Time
update_time.description: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) of when the session was last updated.

num_messages.title: Number of Messages
num_messages.description: The number of messages in the session.

messages.title: Messages
messages.description: The list of messages comprising the session so far.

can_log.title: Can Log
can_log.description: Whether the session can be logged or not.

state.description: The state the session belongs to.

files.title: Files
files.description: The list of files uploaded to the session.

PublicSession-Input.title: PublicSession
PublicSession-Input.description: Only add the fields necessary to show to users.

id.title: Session ID
id.description: The Session ID (UUID4) this request belongs to.

SessionRequest.description: Schema for the request body for triggering a model generation.

status_code.title: Status Code
status_code.description: The status code of the message. 2xx is Okay, 4xx is a client error, 5xx is a server error.

prompt_tokens.title: Prompt Tokens
prompt_tokens.description: Number of tokens in the prompt

generated_tokens.title: Generated Tokens
generated_tokens.description: Number of tokens used during generation

total_tokens.title: Total Tokens
total_tokens.description: Total number of tokens used in the request (prompt + generation)

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.description: The list of users active sessions.
